name: 20th International Conference on Materials Engineering and Nanotechnology
content: Meetings International presents the 20th International Conference on Materials Engineering and Nanotechnology, scheduled during October 26-27, 2021 at Osaka, Japan, which will allow the professional to characteristic their exploration of work through introductions and have a probability to select up mastering about the present circumstance of Materials Engineering. Major attractions of this event would revolve around keynote presentations, oral presentations, and poster presentations. This year we are focusing on the theme â€œAdvancing the research & innovation on Materials Engineering ".
